resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Get
options.description: Get the data of a list

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

owner.name: owner
owner.description: The user ID in Wekan. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
owner.ai_hint: The user ID in Wekan. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: assignees
options.description: The new list of assignee IDs attached to the card. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: description
options.description: The new description of the card

options.name: members
options.description: The new list of member IDs attached to the card. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

boardId.name: boardId
boardId.description: ID of the board where the lists are in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
boardId.ai_hint: ID of the board where the lists are in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

IdUser.name: IdUser
IdUser.description: The ID of the user that boards are attached. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
IdUser.ai_hint: The ID of the user that boards are attached. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

listId.name: listId
listId.description: The ID of the list to get
listId.ai_hint: The ID of the list to get

swimlaneId.name: swimlaneId
swimlaneId.description: The ID of the swimlane that card belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
swimlaneId.ai_hint: The ID of the swimlane that card belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

authorId.name: authorId
authorId.description: The user who posted the comment. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
authorId.ai_hint: 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

cardId.name: cardId
cardId.description: The ID of the card that checklistItem belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
cardId.ai_hint: The ID of the card that checklistItem belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

fromObject.name: fromObject
fromObject.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: title
options.description: The new title for the checklistItem item

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

commentId.name: commentId
commentId.description: The ID of the comment to get
commentId.ai_hint: The ID of the comment to get

items.name: items
items.description: Items to be added to the checklist
items.ai_hint: Items to be added to the checklist

checklistId.name: checklistId
checklistId.description: The ID of the checklistItem that card belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
checklistId.ai_hint: The ID of the checklistItem that card belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

checklistItemId.name: checklistItemId
checklistItemId.description: The ID of the checklistItem item to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
checklistItemId.ai_hint: The ID of the checklistItem item to update. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'board' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'

IF resource == 'checklistItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
